attributes.review: I wanted to get this app because of the love I have for my Cheeto daddy. As soon as I downloaded it, Donald was in my house and karate kicked my grandma in the face and tried to kidnap me!! I deleted the app before he got to me and I will never download this app again :(
attributes.title: ✨ C H E E T O ✨

attributes.review: I got this as a joke to see why people liked him so much, but right away it started to leak my photos onto my social media and started to delete my apps. DO NOT GET THIS APP IF YOU WANT YOUR PRIVACY. I guess this shows how bad Trump really is.🤮
attributes.title: DONT GET THE APP

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and I hate it! I don’t know where to go and it keep glitching my phone. It glitched my phone so bad to the point where my phone stayed on the app until my phone died.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: This app was to confusing to use and made me realize how biased it is and only the age 17 restriction it should be 18 asking me for my PHONE NUMBER right off the bat i knew this app was horrible trying to take my info
attributes.title: This app IS HORRIBLE

attributes.review: This app tracks your location along with so much more private data stored on your phone. Also, my eyes are burning after downloading this app and seeing a racist Cheeto upon opening it.
attributes.title: ITS SPYING ON YOU

attributes.review: I went to Trumps rally in Tulsa, I stood next to him, and not only did I get head Lice, I contracted Ebola. It was bad. They had to cut my leg off. And my right ear. I won’t ever get that smell out of my clothes either. My the odds be ever in your favor.
attributes.title: Donald Trump gave me Lice

attributes.review: I downloaded the app out of curiosity and after a while, it kept glitching on my phone and messing with my WiFi. I highly suggest you do not download the app. Thanks, xoxo
attributes.title: ✨💅🏿❤️absolutely terrible❤️💅🏿✨

attributes.review: I was excited to download this app because I wanted to keep up with rallies and purchasing tickets but this app was full of FAKE NEWS❌ please do not waste your time.
attributes.title: Big disappointment

attributes.review:
